item.title: TIL: You Can Get SSL Errors When You Migrate to a New IP Address
item.description: At work we have a Digital Ocean droplet serving some Wordpress sites. These had no Floating IPs which means if for some reason we needed to destroy the droplet and restore from a snapshot theres a large chance we would end up losing the IP address. So I got approval from the higher-ups to start adding the Floating IP and update the DNS record of one of the sites.
